title: New: Wunder Wunder – Midnight Hours
body:
Opening with a spine tinglingly gorgeous melodic line (Is it a synth or guitar? I dunno…) _Midnight Hours_, the latest track from the L.

A via Melbourne outfit **Wunder Wunder **is a fantastic follow up to their previous track _Coastline. _The brainchild of Miami Horror’s Aaron Shanahan and Benjamin Plant, **Wunder Wunder** create psych infused pop that floats along dreamily, captivating you at every corner. _Midnight Hours_ is the sound of a band really finding itself and honing their craft and has certainly wet my appetite for what’s to come.

Listen to Midnight Hours below and stream  their debut album over at [Fader](http://www.thefader.com/2014/07/08/stream-wunder-wunder-everything-infinite/):
